jcr:content.jcr:title: GCELL XLIFF EXPORT CONNECTOR
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: Taking a step further in the world of multilingual content, Gcell XLIFF Export connector facilitates human translations of your web content. It offers the contextual accuracy of human translation and eliminates any variations by standardizing the format of translated content.
